entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:16 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
